resources.string: Current version is up to date

"If you're a minor under the age of 14, inform your guardian that they must read and agree to \"Kingsoft Statement on Protection of Minors' Personal Data\". You must also seek their consent and guidance before using our services or submitting any personal information to us. To fully understand your rights as a user as well as the ways in which we process your data, read \"Kingsoft Statement on Protection of Minors' Personal Data\"."
"Statement on Protection of Minors' Personal Data"
"Kingsoft Statement on Protection of Minors' Personal Data"
"You're already using this username for the account \"%s\"."
"Statement on Protection of Minors' Personal Data"

"If you continue, you'll withdraw your consent to End User License Agreement, Privacy Policy, and Statement on Protection of Minors' Personal Data. After that, you won't be able to use WPS Mail, and all the data generated on this device will be deleted."
Check attachments containing installation packages for security risks
"POP3 can automatically download attachments but can't edit them"
Username, password, and other server settings
You need to refresh Mail manually to sync your emails
"You'll have to sync Mail manually to be able to sync messages and calendar events."
"The mailing list shows the sender's avatar"
Sync calendar events for this account
Confirm username, password, and account settings are correct.
You may need to verify your account via SMS to receive emails
The email address you entered is invalid.
"This authentication method isn't supported by the server."
The certificate is invalid or inaccessible.
A client certificate is required. Do you want to connect to the server with a client certificate?
The server responded with an error. Check your username and password, then try again.
"The username or password you entered isn't correct. Enter again."
Your account is protected. Verify this device using QQ Security or remove the protection.
"You entered an incorrect server address or the server requires a protocol version that Mail doesn't support."
"Couldn't open connection to server due to security error."
"This server requires security features that your Android device doesn't support, including %s"
TLS required but not supported by server.
Your account has 2-step authentication. Authentication is required.
Enter a valid email address and password.
Welcome to Mail, an email client custom-made for Xiaomi by Kingsoft. You can use this app to compose, send, and receive emails.
"Couldn't download the attachment for this message."
"Don't have permissions to access external storage"
Would you like to embed or attach the selected images?
Attach the selected files to a new email?
You may not have permission to open this file or the file may be damaged.
"Unfortunately, you can't save or open this type of attachment."
This attachment is an installation package. Make sure you trust the source before opening it. Install now?
This message contains an installation package. Make sure you trust the source before opening it.
Allow the app to autostart for it to be able to sync your emails. You can grant this permission in Settings.
A certificate with this name already exists
The password you entered is incorrect
"Can't forward email. Permissions to access external storage required."
You can add more images as attachments
"There's no text in the message body."
Move all emails from this sender to Trash
Move emails with this recipient to Trash (only new emails)
Delete mail that includes this recipient in the To or Cc field
Access to system contacts is required
This email was signed with a trusted certificate
This is an encrypted email. Add the certificate required for decrypting it.
"Couldn't load email. Tap to try again."
Mark this message as spam? The message will be moved to the \"Spam\" folder and its sender will be added to blocklist.
Would you like to delete this email and block the sender?
Enable mail service complete update and activate security settings
The mail received %s ago will be deleted automatically. Tap to change.
"Can't download attachment. Not enough space on external storage."
Not enough space on internal storage.
Turn on account sync to receive emails automatically
Turn on sync to receive emails automatically
How do I get an authorization code?
Notifications for emails that arrive will be silenced
Downloading without Wi-Fi may use significant mobile data. Download anyway?
"Some of the selected items aren't downloaded. Download them first."
Message is too big to download.
%s shared an item stored in the cloud with you.
Stop editing and discard all changes now?
The message you entered is too long
"If you delete this rule, it can't be recovered later. This action won't delete any emails in existing folders. Delete rule now?"
Emails that fulfill the rule will be automatically moved to the selected folder
"Rule won't be applied to existing emails"
The account ID or password is incorrect.
Use a verification code to sign in.
Your account has been added to the blocklist. Contact your email service provider to resolve this issue.
Turn on IMAP or POP3 and try again.
Turn on IMAP and try again.
Verify your identity on the web version of Outlook first.
"This domain name doesn't exist. Check the URL and try again."
The password you entered is incorrect.
"Couldn't verify your identity. Use a verification code to sign in."
Your password has expired. Update your password and sign in again.
Turn on POP3 and try again.
Your IP address has been blocked. Contact Sohu Mail customer service to fix this issue.
Check your network connection and try again.
Your account has been frozen. Sign in to Sohu Mail in your browser to activate it.
Your password has expired. Sign in to Sohu Mail in your browser to get a server-generated password.
Tap to sign in to an Exchange account
Allow access to contacts to be able to use this feature
Describe the issue here. We will send you an email after we look into it.
You have multiple folders in your inbox. Set notifications about new messages in specific folders.
Swipe left/right to view previous/next email
Filter emails from senders reported by multiple users
"Clear this app's data in Settings > System apps and try again."
"Google's terms and conditions have changed. Sign in to Gmail again."
"Couldn't authenticate account. Try adding this account again."
"If you have any questions, feel free to drop us a line in our official WeChat account: "
How to sign in to iCloud mail
You can create a password to use with your iCloud mail here: iCloud.com
Password for incoming mail server is incorrect
Enter a valid recipient email address
Sign in to other major email service clients
Use authorized passcodes to sign in to %1$s if you selected this option previously. Go to https://email.163.com/ to reset your password or passcode.
"%s This issue might be caused by the account's two-factor authentication. Try entering your password or turn off two-factor authentication."
Use authorized passcodes to sign in to %1$s if you selected this option previously. Go to https://mail.sina.com.cn/ to reset your password or passcode.
"Contact us in WeChat to get help: "
%s protocol will be used for signing in by default. If you want to use a different protocol select it manually among the sign-in options.
"You'll be redirected to Microsoft to enter password"
"Sign in with OAuth (Personal Outlook users cannot synchronize their calendars when logging in with OAuth)"
Load emails when using mobile data
Do you forward with signed PDF attachments?
Download Calendar to be able to use this feature
Attachments in your forwarded message will be downloaded prior to sending.
Tap to switch to selecting a day
Tap to switch to selecting a year
Check network connection and try again
No app was found to open this attachment.
"Couldn't find apps to open this image"
Copied successfully. Open QQ and find this group to join.
Notify about new messages in selected folders only?
Sign in using this verification code
Send an SMS from the associated phone number and then tap \"Message sent\".
"If you've already sent an SMS from the associated phone number, tap \"Message sent\" to continue."
"Can't add more than 5 verification codes. Sign in to your inbox on a computer and delete the codes you aren't using."
"If errors occur while you're entering your password, close this page and open it again."
Send a text message from the associated phone number
If your current phone number is associated with the account, tap \"Send SMS\".
Install a browser before signing in
Enter your Google Account username and password on the following sign-in page.
"Couldn't open PDF. Install a PDF reader and try again."
"Contact your email system's administrator and update your certificate."
Server authorization error while syncing outbox.
The maximum size of Email has been reached.
Insufficient storage in the mail server
Server provision error while syncing outbox.
An error occurred. Wait a minute or two and try again.
Looks like this attachment has a signed copy. Open it instead?
"Can't convert to PDF. This message is too long."
Wait until the message is fully loaded before converting to PDF
"Can't add more signatures. Delete older signatures to add new ones."
PDF file is corrupted. Check this file and try again.
Allows app to access your email, usernames, and passwords
For syncing events from email to your Calendar
For syncing your email contacts as system contacts. We recommend selecting \"Always allow\" to avoid interruptions.
For creating new emails, as well as saving and adding attachments
For signing in and managing system accounts
"Allows app to read your emails' attachments"
"For displaying and changing contacts' email addresses"
Access and save photos and files on device
When the switch is toggled on, you agree that we may collect your personal data. You can toggle the switch off, revoke your authorization, and delete your data from our servers at any time.
Consent to User Agreement and Privacy Policy
"Logs contain debugging info of the email client and your device info. This information is used to locate problems faster. By tapping \"%1$s\" below, you're agreeing to our \"%2$s\"."
Try using WPS Office to open this attachment.
"Couldn't find an app for this attachment. Try using WPS Office."
No application found to handle this action
Copied successfully. Go back to the sign-in page and paste the code into the password form.
Copy verification code, tap \"Enter username and password to sign in\" on the sign-in page, and paste the code into the password form.
Get a new code from %s to sign in.
"Can't find your sent emails? Tap here to learn what you can do."
Sync sent messages from QQ Mail
Sync inbox less frequently while Do not disturb is on
"This email is too long. Wait until it's fully synced or view the message on your computer."
"The email is too long. Can't edit the original email."
Mail is requesting to copy your database into a file
"Couldn't connect to the network. Tap to try again."
"Account \"%s\" can't be synced due to security requirements."
"Looks like the recipient doesn't have the trusted certificate required for encrypting this email. Send a regular email instead?"
"Couldn't validate server certificate \u0009 (Make sure'Auto sync time' is turned on in Settings)"
"Couldn't sign in multiple times in a row. Wait a minute or two and try again."
Too many frequent sign-in attempts. Wait a minute or two and try again.
This email account is locked. Contact the email service provider to unlock it first.
"This email account isn't activated. Contact the email service provider to activate it first."
This account is accessed from too many devices. Remove this account from one of the devices to be able to access it on this one.
"Couldn't find a valid account. Check whether the info you entered is correct and try again."
Turn on %s in the email web client first
Toggle on the SSL switch in the manual configurations
"Try the following: 1. Connect to a different network or reboot your Wi-Fi router. 2. Make sure you're using valid certificates."
"The server's certificate doesn't support this domain"
"The certificate's issuer is not a trusted organization."
"The certificate's issuer is not a trusted organization."
"Can't get protocol configurations from Microsoft. Use a different protocol or update the protocol from Microsoft."
"Couldn't open your default SMS messaging app. Open the app and send the verification SMS manually."
Password for outgoing mail server is incorrect
Grant calendar permissions in Settings > Permissions to be able to sync calendar events.
Grant permissions in Settings to be able to open Security
Turn on sync for Mail in the Settings
Fifth day of Chinese New Year
Fourth day of Chinese New Year
Second day of Chinese New Year
Seventh day of Chinese New Year
Sixth day of Chinese New Year
Third day of Chinese New Year
"Couldn't access server. Wait a minute or two and try again."
"Can't receive emails. Not enough storage space."
Account info has expired. Tap to sign in again.
"Couldn't connect to Gmail. Check your network settings and try again."
"Couldn't send email. Saved it to the \"Outgoing\" folder."
"Couldn't sync due to a missing certificate. Tap to add the certificate again."
"This device hasn't been authorized. Check your SMS for an authorization message."
"Couldn't sync contacts and events. Change the related permissions to \"Always allow\" to solve this issue."
"Couldn't sync events. Change calendar permissions to \"Always allow\" to solve this issue."
"Couldn't sync contacts. Change contacts permissions to \"Always allow\" to solve this issue."
Turn on calendar and contacts sync to sync calendar and contacts
Turn on calendar sync to receive calendar reminders
Allow this app to sync contacts to be able to add them as system contacts
Select less text to copy and try again
"Confirm that you aren't 16 years old yet?"
Update the list of available domains and configurations
Send error logs to help us improve Mail
Please confirm that you have read and agree to the User Experience Plan
Use a new code to sign in
"(By tapping \"Agree\", you're giving Mail all the required permissions)"
To revoke your authorization, go to Settings > Privacy settings.

"We'll collect your Android ID in the encrypted form and use it as your unique user identifier in Mail. We might also collect usage logs. You can revoke your authorization in privacy settings anytime."
"This account isn't set up to sync automatically. Touch "Sync Now to sync mail once, or Change Sync Settings to set up this account to sync mail automatically.
Your browser has crashed. Download the latest version of Webview from Google Play to help resolve this issue.
You can try to sign in again
"Couldn't open page due to missing WebView plug-in"
A certificate error occurred, proceed anyway?
%s shared a WPS Office document with you.
Use mobile data to upload logs?
